full_summary:
# Dell TOAD Maintenance and Support or Equivalent for Statistics Canada 
=============================================

**Bid Solicitation**
---------------

### Code Information

* Solicitation number: SSC-24-00026619:T
* Amendment number: None
* Solicitation number: BPM021471/26619

### Closing Details

* Tender closing date: Wednesday, June 18, 2024 at 14:00:00
* Tender status: Expired

### Summary

Database software maintenance and support services for Dell TOAD required for Statistics Canada through open competitive bidding process. 

### Description

To register for access to tender documents and submit proposal, bidders can navigate through SSC P2P portal (https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login) or in french: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/usr/login

### Important Details
* G-SIN classification: N7030AG (Computer software, office automation, document management, networks)
* Service areas span across Canada (excluding National Capital Region)
* Contracting entity and end-user are Shared Services Canada at 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, ON, K1P 1B6

### Service Details
* Technical specifications and requirements can be found in tender documents, available through SSC P2P portal.

### Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria
Eligible bidders will be chosen through a Request for Proposal open competitive bidding process. Evaluation will be done based on the following criteria (taken from SSC guidelines and description):

* G-SIN classification, Trade Agreements scope
* Bidder’s technical capabilities to fulfill the requirement, as presented in their proposal

### Contact Information
For more information and assistance on bids and technical difficulties:

Contact : Javier Ventura
 Email: Not available 
 Phone: 343 576 9329 
 Fax  43 3576 9329 
 Address: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa ON
